products.name: Diet Coke
products.labels: Peu ou pas de sucre,Végétarien,Végétalien,Sans huile de palme,Sans sucre,en:Isaac's Favorite Drink
products.facts: ["Diet Coke is packaged in a 355 ml aluminum can, which is recyclable and lightweight.","The can is made from approximately 70% recycled aluminum, reducing the need for new raw materials.","Diet Coke contains no calories and uses artificial sweeteners to maintain flavor without sugar.","The production of Diet Coke adheres to strict quality control standards to ensure consistency and safety in every can."]

products.name: Ginger Crystallized In Dark Chocolate
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Snacks, Condiments, Fruits and vegetables based foods, Sweet snacks, Cocoa and its products, Confectioneries, Fruits based foods, Chocolate candies, Spices, Ginger, Candied fruits, Crystallized ginger, Groceries
products.labels: No GMOs, Non GMO project, Rainforest Alliance
products.facts: ["Made from real ginger root, providing natural flavor and health benefits.","Dark chocolate used is often sourced from sustainable cacao farms, promoting ecological balance.","Contains no artificial preservatives, ensuring high quality and freshness of ingredients.","Ginger is known for its anti-inflammatory properties, adding a healthful aspect to this treat."]

products.name: Classic Peanut Butter Jars
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages,Plant-based foods,Legumes and their products,Fats,Spreads,Nuts and their products,Plant-based spreads,Vegetable fats,Oilseed purees,Legume butters,Nut butters,Peanut butters
products.labels: No gluten, No GMOs, No added sugar, Non GMO project, en:certified-gluten-free
products.facts: ["The jar is made from 100% recyclable glass, reducing environmental impact.","The lid is typically made from metal, which is also recyclable and helps maintain freshness.","Classic peanut butter jars are designed to be BPA-free, ensuring safe storage of food products.","The glass material provides excellent barrier properties, preserving the quality and flavor of the peanut butter."]

products.name: Ice Cream, Espresso Fudge
products.facts: ["Ice Cream Espresso Fudge typically contains high-quality ingredients like real espresso, cream, sugar, and cocoa.","Many brands focus on using ethically sourced coffee beans to promote sustainable farming practices.","The production of Ice Cream Espresso Fudge can have a lower carbon footprint if made with locally sourced ingredients.","Premium versions often avoid artificial flavors and preservatives, ensuring a richer taste and better quality."]

products.name: Yeellow Label Tea
products.facts: ["Yeellow Label Tea is made from high-quality black tea leaves sourced from various regions.","The packaging is designed to be eco-friendly, minimizing waste and promoting sustainability.","The tea is carefully selected and blended to ensure a consistent flavor profile in every cup.","Yeellow Label Tea is known for its rich aroma and robust taste, making it a popular choice among tea drinkers."]

products.name: Oreo Original
products.categories: Snacks, Sweet snacks, Biscuits and cakes, Biscuits, Chocolate biscuits, Filled biscuits, Chocolate sandwich cookies
products.facts: ["Oreo Original cookies are made with a combination of wheat flour, sugar, cocoa, and palm oil.","The packaging is made from recyclable materials, contributing to reduced environmental impact.","Oreo has committed to sourcing sustainable cocoa through programs that support responsible farming practices.","The cookies are free from artificial flavors and preservatives, ensuring a quality product."]

products.name: Finest White Loaf
products.facts: ["Finest White Loaf is made from high-quality wheat flour, ensuring a soft and fluffy texture.","The packaging is recyclable, promoting eco-friendliness and reducing waste.","It contains no artificial preservatives, enhancing its natural quality and freshness.","The loaf is baked using traditional methods, which helps to retain its flavor and nutritional value."]
